posts.post_title: TRADED ..  1895 Mayo Wilbert Robinson SGC Auth
posts.post_content:
CARD HAS BEEN TRADED.  Thanks for the interest.

If anyone is interested in trading please email me at: [url]danp306@gmail.com[/url]

Card looks like it had a hole near the top of his head penciled in.

Here's a link to some cards I am looking for:
